SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BuildOwnController
Controller class for the 'Build Your Own Pizza' interface This class handles user interactions for customizing a pizza with various toppings, sauces, sizes, and extra options.
BuildYourOwn
Represents a specific type of pizza where customers can build their own pizza by choosing toppings, size, and sauce.
CurrentOrderController
Controller class for managing the current order in a pizza ordering application.
Deluxe
Represents the Deluxe pizza, a pre-defined pizza type with a specific set of toppings.
Main
Main application class for the pizza shop application.
MainMenuController
Controller class for the main menu in a pizza ordering application.
Meatzza
Represents the Meatzza pizza, a pre-defined pizza type with a focus on meat toppings.
Order
Represents an order in a pizza shop application.
Pepperoni
Represents the Pepperoni pizza, a specific pizza type with pepperoni as its primary topping.
Pizza
Represents an abstract Pizza class defining the structure and behaviors of various pizza types.
PizzaMaker
Factory class for creating various types of Pizza objects.
Sauce
Enumeration of the different types of sauces available for pizzas.
Seafood
Represents the Seafood pizza, a unique pizza type featuring a selection of seafood toppings.
Size
Enumeration of the different sizes available for pizzas with associated additional prices.
SpecialtyPizzasController
Controller class for the 'Specialty Pizzas' interface This class handles user interactions for selecting between 5 preset specialty pizzas: Deluxe, Meatzza, Pepperoni, Seafood, and Supreme.
StoreOrders
Manages the collection of orders for a pizza store.
StoreOrdersController
Controller class for managing store orders in a pizza ordering application.
Supreme
Represents the Supreme pizza, a richly topped pizza type with a variety of ingredients.
Toppings
Enumeration of the different toppings available for pizzas.
